Products

Simple, Beautiful, and Easy to Master

ProInspector: Building Department Software

Send your reports perfectly every time.

ProInspector was designed to meet the specific requirements of the municipal building department and their obligatory reporting to province.

Our ProInspector software advances the department efficiency for issuing and managing building permits, inspections, and reporting. ProInspector collects and organizes all building permit information providing clear status reports for improved decision making and communications to inspectors and the public.

Learn More

ProPermits: Permit Portal for Applicants

Applicant portal to apply for and manage building permits

ProPermit was designed to meet the specific requirements of the municipal building department and their desire to streamline the application and communication process with applicants.

The ProPermit portal allows applicants to apply for permits, see upcoming inspections and outstanding deficiencies, signal to the building department when deficiencies have been rectified, all through an easy to use web interface.

Learn More

ProMaintenance: Work Order Management for Public Works

Workflow software for managing work orders

ProwareLabs developed ProMaintenance as a solution to help improve work order workflow.

The easy to use application allows you to create and manage work orders and assign them to your work crews. See changes in real-time through the live feed and see things move forward as it happens.

Learn More

ProDevelopment: Modular Software & Customizable APIs

ProwareLabs development experience and ProDevelopment software modules a great combo!

ProDevelopment lets municipalities and other organizations leverage ProwareLabs' software modules to help integrate disparate municipal legacy systems. Think of ProDevelopment software modules as semi-custom building blocks that help speed up software development and municipal systems integration.

The ProDevelopment APIs can be customized to integrate; databases, information and reporting to your specific needs. If you have integration issues or need help uploading legacy data or have challenging reporting issues, we can help!

Learn More
